lines:
who Mellen St

Cambridge 
Wee 30.08

man

TANIR

INS

ORIGINE P

MANAN

1956

Dear Mr Stearm,

We are glad to 
tell you that we had a very 
planent Chirstmas here. But 
herring enjoyed rather much, 
We found that the forte deller 
you gave us are alme

all gone, We would like. 
to have you send us 
each ten dolle more
raw: who Mellen St Cambridge Wee 30.08 man TANIR INS ORIGINE P MANAN 1956 Dear Mr Stearm, We are glad to tell you that we had a very planent Chirstmas here. But herring enjoyed rather much, We found that the forte deller you gave us are alme all gone, We would like. to have you send us each ten dolle more

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that while they had a pleasant Christmas, they request $10 each to cover expenses through the holidays.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
